remarks: Two structures with the same base, hom-sets and composition operation have the same identity function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` D ) ) $.
catpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` D ) ) $.
catpropd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
catpropd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. W ) $.
cidpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( Id ` C ) = ( Id ` D ) ) $.
